newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spanish markets are reacting well - Montoro.
newsitem.headline: Spanish markets are reacting well - Montoro.

text.p: Spanish Economy Secretary Cristobal Montoro said on Friday that Spanish markets were behaving well and he added that the bourse was correcting after sharp and recent gains.
"(Spanish) markets are not behaving badly. In this sense what happened to stocks has a lot to do with profit taking after a sharp rally," Montoro told reporters after a seminar.
He added that the peseta showed a limited reaction as yields, which is showing "the calm of the Spanish economy".
